"Is this NTSC or PAL?"

Its NTSC and it works on my PAL machine.

For all those not knowing having trouble with wfbs manager.

First download 'wii backup manager' (just google it).
Click 'add' and then 'transfer' to ISO.
Once you do that you can open the 'wfbs manager' as and add it on as normal.
